STATION.description: Unique identifier for each weather station

value_dict.PLM00012375: Identifier for the OKECIE, PL weather station

value_dict.OKECIE, PL: Name of the weather station located in Okecie, Poland

LATITUDE.description: Geographical latitude of the weather station

LONGITUDE.description: Geographical longitude of the weather station

ELEVATION.description: Height of the weather station above sea level (in meters)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in weather forecasting.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather data, please predict the average temperature.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted average temperature is ___. (Please fill in the blank with a numerical value representing the temperature in Celsius.).

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in weather forecasting.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather data, please predict the maximum temperature.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted maximum temperature is ___. (Please fill in the blank with a numerical value representing the temperature in Celsius.).

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in weather forecasting.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather data, please predict the minimum temperature.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted minimum temperature is ___. (Please fill in the blank with a numerical value representing the temperature in Celsius.).

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in weather forecasting.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather data, please predict the precipitation.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted precipitation is ___. (Please fill in the blank with a numerical value representing the precipitation in millimeters.).
